com.radiotelescope.controller.user

Class UserChangePasswordController

  • BaseRestController
    • com.radiotelescope.controller.user.UserChangePasswordController

  • public class UserChangePasswordController
extends BaseRestController

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserChangePasswordController(UserUserWrapper userWrapper, Logger logger) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Result execute(ChangePasswordForm form)
      Execute method that is in charge of taking the PathVariable request and calling the UserUserWrapper.changePassword method. If this method returns an class AccessReport this means the user did not pass authentication and the controller should respond accordingly.

      • Methods inherited from class com.radiotelescope.controller.BaseRestController

        getLogger, getResult, setResult

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserChangePasswordController

        public UserChangePasswordController(UserUserWrapper userWrapper,
                                    Logger logger)

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public Result execute(ChangePasswordForm form)

        Execute method that is in charge of taking the PathVariable request and calling the UserUserWrapper.changePassword method. If this method returns an class AccessReport this means the user did not pass authentication and the controller should respond accordingly.

        Otherwise, the class ChangePassword command object was executed, and the controller should respond based on whether the command was a success or not

        Parameters:
        form - the class ChangePasswordForm
        See Also:
        UserUserWrapper.changePassword, class AccessReport, class ChangePassword
